docs.lead_paragraph: P.T. BARNUM was born on July 5, 1810. He arrived late. It was a pity, for he would so much have enjoyed being born on the Fourth of July." Thus Mr. Werner begins his book about America's greatest advertiser, moneymaker, humbug, showman and -- doubtless above all -- American.

headline.main: Barnum -- Showman, Mountebank and Philosopher; BARNUM, By M.R. Warner. New York: Harcourt, Brace & Co. Barnum -- Showman and Philosopher

docs.abstract: review by T L Masson of M R Woerner's biography
